author: Sarah M.
review: I got my son this tablet for bringing his math grade up 19 points in 1 marking period. Not only did I get it on sale for $40 (usually they are $50 but black Friday they were $35), it was really easy to set up. You can have multiple "accounts" on there (2 adults and I think 2 kids) so they each require a password to log in. He ended up dropping it face down on our tiled kitchen floor, cracking the screen. I chatted with Amazon's customer service (based in India, so I used the chat option online) and they ended up sending me a replacement kindle, 2 day shipping! No where offers a user error warranty and now we don't have to deal with the cracked screen. I cant see spending hundreds of dollars on an Ipad, when you can get this tablet for $50 and end up with superior customer service!!!

author: Amy P.
review: I love it! It is user friendly and has all the features that you could want in a table. Amazon has amazing customer service and I am also a Prime member. I like to read, but I don't like to carry cumbersome books around. I can find almost anything I want to read on my kindle and download it for an affordable price. It fits perfect in my purse so I can use it anywhere to kill time. I love the wifi and browsing features as well. The 7" screen is worth the small amount extra. I highly recommend the Kindle to anyone in the market for a tablet.

author: Whitney H.
review: The Fire HD is fantastic. I purchased 2, one for each of my kids and they love it. They are too young to own a phone so instead of stealing my phone and using all my space to download their games, they can now have their own. I love that it has parental blocks so they can't purchase anything without my password and I can block the internet and email if needed. Since it's a Kindle, we have access to books as well so when it's time for them to do their reading, they don't need to do anything else, they just download a book.

author: Jessica R.
review: The battery life on this is terrible. Amazons customer service is terrible. Their solution is to buy another kindle. Why would I invest more money in a product that only lasted 8 months and they had no interest in helping fix the one I had or replace it. They just want your money and then they'll place you on hold and transfer you to 3647499 people making you rehash your story and problem 64738292 times before telling you sorry can't help, but you can buy another one! Awful!

author: Emily D.
review: Awesome little tablet; however, I do wish that there were more available apps and more reliable apps for android tablets. The tablet itself is good for the most part, but the apps crash quite often. I like the battery life of the tablet so far and its usability. There are some things (like downloads) I can't quite seem to find on it, but hopefully I will learn the tricks of the trade soon! I even found it an adorable little case!

author: Channon M.
review: I purchased not only one of these tablets, but two of them, just to be continually disappointed. In the first two months of usage, no problems at all. The interface was a little clunky but i got used to it. Then after adding music to my library, the device would crash ALL THE TIME. Even once restored and restored, i would continually have the same issue. I have since purchased an iPad mini and am so much happier because of it.

author: Shelley D.
review: What a simple and lightning fast little tablet! I love that it perfectly syncs to my Amazon account. It is a very affordable choice, and I can read my kindle books, watch Amazon videos (even download them to watch later, which is very helpful when travelling. It is also good for other functions, such as games, apps, and simple internet browsing. The battery life is good, and I use it all the time.

author: Loni R.
review: I absolutely hated this tablet, it runs out of storage which you can not upgrade you have to pay to do pretty much anything on it and god forbid you have added money to an Amazon account and forgot your password. If so you are out that money. I will never own another, and will always from here on out use full Android devices only, functionality was poop Here is what I thought of mine.

author: Misty Y.
review: LOVE my tablet, and my kids do too! Love that I can put it on FreeTime for my kids and know that they will be limited on what and how long they can play! Super easy to use. Only issue to this point has been that the kids tend to quickly use up all the memory and I frequently have to delete things just so that it can connect to wifi. Definitely need to look into expanding storage!

author: claudia w.
review: At the begining i didn't like the way it run, it wasn't as costumer friendly as an ipad, but i got used to it within a couple of hours and then i loved it! I use it all the time, i read on it, i stream movies and TV shows, i play games and check my social media... its hd and so much easier than go and find my TV remote, everything can b done in seconds... LOVE IT

author: Jill S.
review: This is my go to device when shopping online, watching movies, checking Facebook and basically everything else except creating documents with word. It is great to be able to set up profiles for each family member. My kids only see and can only access what I want them to. Now that the Kindle Fires accept SD cards it has bumped up to a 5 star product.

author: Collette R.
review: I use this everyday. I have had it now for two year San Diego have dropped it many times and has not got a scratch on it. I find this very handy to have and I keep everything on itm although you have to take into consideration the apps you pay for on Amazon store are often free on Google app store but other than that would recommend to anyone.

author: Jennifer B.
review: The Amzon Fire tablet is nice fore the price. It has some things I don't love about it and other things I do enjoy. I pretty much use the table for reading or letting my kids play video games. It takes a while to load certain games and videos. If you're mostly looking for an ereader of sorts this is a great option and not too pricey.

author: Lisa C.
review: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It does a good job of staying connected to the Internet. It has a child mode so they won't buy a bunch of games or apps. It also allows you to have multiple profiles on one tablet which is really cool. The camera is not the best but for a kid who just wants to use the camera it's okay.

author: Jacqueline M.
review: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. He had an iPad which he loved but dropped it and shattered the screen beyond repair. This tablet was a very inexpensive but decent replacement. It work well enough for what he uses it for which is watching YouTube or Amazon Prime tv. I would say it's pretty good for the price I paid.

author: Andrea Q.
review: Great tablet for our 3 year old daughter. We wanted something relatively inexpensive with parental controls, and this product has it. We paired it with a durable protective case and has been going strong for one year now. We chose this option over the kids version for the price and the availability of us using it as well.

author: Donna B.
review: I have the 7HD and I also have an Amazon Paperwhite. Both of these products are great. I can do everything on the HD7 that I want in this size "computer"  Love it. So glad I decided to go ahead and get one. Have not had any issues with it at all. I play lots of games on it and the battery stays charged for several days.

author: Angela E.
review: I had to purchase a new kindle because my daughter took over my precious one. I absolutely love this tablet! It does everything that I need and then some! Super affordable and easy to use! My daughter now tries to steal this one :) I never thought I would read a digital book, but I don't mind doing that one this one!

author: Kaylene S.
review: Coming from a iPad, this took a little getting used to, but I love that this is much more durable, that it fits in most of my purses, and that I read more than game now!! I wish I allowed instagram, but I can't seem to find the right app. This tablet has been so nice to have, it was a birthday gift from my husband.

author: Jori J.
review: We are an amazon.com family through and through! I'm on my 3rd kindle, my husband is on his 3rd and our daughter is on her second. My only complaint is that you can only purchase apps through amazon - not the google play store and that can cause some frustration with my daughter who likes to play specific games

author: Catherine C.
review: For the price I did not think this would be that great. I took the chance and ordered one for my 8 yr old at Christmas. After seeing and using hers I ordered one for me too. Easy to use, lightweight and every bit as good in every way as the more expensive brands, way to go Amazon. Great product, great price.

author: Emily M.
review: I bought this tablet for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. He uses it when he travels for work so he watches Netflix and plays games on it. He says he loves it and the only thing he said is sometimes when purchasing apps from the store it freezes up a bit but other than that it works great for him.

author: Cerra C.
review: I love my Kindle Fire. I had previously used a Kindle app on another device but the Fire is so much easier because I am able to purchase books directly from bookstore without needing to exit the Kindle app/bookstore. My eyes don't get tired reading on this device when compared to my phone or other tablets.

author: Alicia J.
review: I love my Kindle Fire. I use it mostly for reading and Facebook. I have only had it lock up once and had to restart it. it was a wonderful price as I got it on sale. It is very easy to use and I love that it is small and fits in my purse easy. This is the second Kindle that I have purchased and I love it.

author: Brooke W.
review: I absolutely love my Fire! This is my second one and will probably always buy them. As soon as I activated my new one all my things from the other on where just there, it was super easy. I pretty much use it everyday while watching TV and before bed. It's wonderful and I would recommend one to anyone!

author: Stacey S.
review: Amazon has come out with yet another great product. I had the first kindle edition that was just the book version. Having amazon prime allows me to access so many different free books, movies & TV shows. I am very satisfied with this product, the only con is that I wish the battery life was longer

author: Cassidy M.
review: I love this tablet. I got this as a Christmas gift. This product has a smaller screen than most similar products out there. It is easy to use. It has Android system. I have experienced freezing and exiting games when I play them. I would recommend this product to someone with kids or an elder.

author: Kathryn G.
review: I love my Kindle! It is not the fastest tablet all the time but I love being able to read and play games all on one tablet. It allows me to download many books and games from Amazon. The only issue I have had is storage which I fixed with an SD card and speed which is very rarely a huge issue.

author: bethany s.
review: My husband and I got our girls Amazon Fire HD 7'' Tablets 18gb. They needed something with a lot of memory but better price than Ipads. We have had no issues whatsoever. They have a ton of games, songs, pics, etc on it and still have a lot of memory. Simple to use. All around great tablet.

author: Marieka B.
review: I primarily use my Fire HD for reading books and it perform excellently. Easy to buy books directly from the Amazon store and begin reading instantly. The size is like holding a physical book in your hands. I like that I don't have to leave the light on during late night reading sessions.

author: Marieka B.
review: I primarily use my Fire HD for reading books and it perform excellently. Easy to buy books directly from the Amazon store and begin reading instantly. The size is like holding a physical book in your hands. I like that I don't have to leave the light on during late night reading sessions.

author: Marsia M.
review: Love this tablet. Highly recommend to any book worms looking to transition into eBook reading. I love being able to pay for a book through amazon and instantly having access to read it on my kindle. I also love having the ability to surf the web and download apps like other tablets.

author: lois m.
review: Do not like the layout on this, your "wallpaper/background" is amazon adverts? which I for some reason cannot change.I've previously had a nexus which was much nicer to use.Good thing about this is how cheap it is really! probably great if it's just used for reading like a kindle.

author: Tierney G.
review: In my household we have about 7 or 8 of the Kindle tablets, 4 are currently Fires. They are durable and they offer everything the other tablets have without the hefty price. They are now available in a few sizes and colors, which we like because everyone wants something different.

author: Ashley B.
review: Bought for my son for Christmas. Great gift for him. Bought to help with education not to sit a play I educational games all day. We set limits of 1 hour a day for educational play. So far we have had great experience. I would highly recommend for a first tablet. Very inexpensive.

author: Lori K.
review: This is a very easy tablet to work with. Small screen was chosen because this travels everywhere with me. No problems connecting and very easy to set up. I purchased when on special through Amazon and will probably upgrade to a larger screen when there is another deal or package !

author: Jessica P.
review: I ADORE my Kindle. I'm a book lover and a social media junkie. I researched many tablets and kept coming back to the Kindle. I love amazon and the kindle makes me love them more. Ive yet to have a problem with my Kindle the year or so Ive had it, I bought it on Prime Day last year.

author: Krista R.
review: Awesome Tablet. Easy to use works great totally recommend this product I bought this for my six year old to play educational games, read, learn and even have a little fun. I love this tablet I'm thinking about buying more. It's a really great product and the price was fantastic.

author: Amanda M.
review: I purchased this for my husband who is an avid reader and his paperwhite had been used way more than necessary. I had low expectations due to the low price point, but both he and I were amazed at the quality, speed, and ease of use. I would highly recommend others to buy this.

author: Kim S.
review: Bought this for my mom she uses it all the times it's simple to use and you can do anything on it, it was a great price too compared to other brands from which they break easily or you have to buy more storage. Overall I would say a good purchase for something handy and easy!

author: Kristen O.
review: I love this device! This is my third or fourth unit. I can't believe how much I can do on this device. I don't even have a TV because I can watch shows and movies right on the tablet. I've never had a problem except getting one stolen. I highly recommend this tablet! !!

author: Indy O.
review: Live it as it allows me to read non stop... I can find any book and it keeps me constantly intrigued.. I use it everyday....and it was very affordable... I haven't had any problems soo far...it's been a pleasure having it and I would most certainly recommend to others.

author: Brenda N.
review: I was very surprised at the quality of the tablet due to the pricing that I received it for. I love every feature about the tablet it's quick the colors are vibrant and it's very easy to use. This tablet is used every day by my husband. I would recommend this to anyone

author: Rebecca M.
review: I over love my tablet. It is small and very durable. I have dropped it and nothing has happened to it. I cought it when it was on sell so i only paid fifty for it. It past all my expectations. I read on it daily. I recommend this for anyone who loves to read.

author: Lacey C.
review: I love my Fire tablet! I use mostly to read my ebooks when I'm on the go our relaxing at home. I also enjoy it for playing games and catching up on my shows through Netflix or Amazon Prime. I am really happy with the device and haven't had any issues with it!

author: Abby K.
review: A really fun and great product. I got it on sale so it was definitely worth the money. The app store is a lacking quite a bit, but I don't have a problem with that personally. Really easy to carry in my purse. I was even able to download my textbooks onto it.

author: Raven A.
review: Perfect for all things media! My little boy loves watching movies on ours & all the choices he gets with Amazon prime. Has some down sides, YouTube won't work on it & it's not compatible with schooling but if you're into books, music, or movies it's perfect!

author: Carmen G.
review: Me encanta. Tiene todas las funciones de una Table y a la misma vez es un excelente lector de libros. La uso todos los días para todo lo que quiero saber y para ir directo a Amazon. Para mi es la mejor y una de las mas completas por su costo y accesibilidad.

author: Maribel S.
review: I liked the tablet but what I didn't like was that it didn't have google play store on it. I don't use it anymore I gave it away because I barely use it. That was the first tablet I had ever gotten. It did meet my expectations but it didn't at the same time.

author: Ariana E.
review: I love this product. I purchased it for black friday. I purchased it with ads, not knowing what it meant. I would buy without ads next time, they get annoying. But I use it for games and free books. Great for travel. It was only $30 so I got 2 of them.

author: Charlotte R.
review: When the price dropped on these I snatched one for my son. As am Amazon Prime member he has access to hundreds, maybe thousands of free movies. The display is vibrant and I like the black background. This thing really gives my iPad a run for its money.

author: Katherine B.
review: My entire family loves the Kindle Fire HD 7. We use them to not only read but to watch TV (hulu, prime and netflix), gaming, music and research. It's small enough to fit into bags and purses and durable to withstand the daily life of out active family!

author: Leah F.
review: Got this for our son for Christmas and he loves it. It took me some getting used to coming from iOS and android but it's easy enough. With prime it's even better. Lots of free apps on Amazon underground. Plus I love all the parental locks I can add.

author: Shirah S.
review: This was given to me as a gift and I definitely love the interface and how easy this is to understand. Great for streaming Amazon prime shows and reading my favorite books. Also got 3 months free of the Washington post just for having a kindle.

author: Kait R.
review: I absolutely love this tablet! The display is nice and bright for my little ones! I also love the parental control features that they have available, the option to play educational games or read before doing "fun" things is so cool and helpful!

author: Josephine M.
review: I purchased a Amazon Fire HD 7 in. Tablet. I love i!! If you are an Amazon member you get a lot of apps free. I also can watch my t.v. programs on it. It is very easy to use. I use it everyday. I am so happy with it. I would recommend it.

author: Kiersten V.
review: It is nice that you can get this at such a cheap cost compared to an ipad. The battery life on it seems good. My one complaint is that when it is in a case and you are trying to play a movie the speaker gets covered and isn't that loud.

author: Leah W.
review: This is a very good tablet, but obviously it isn't as good as an iPad, but if you are a reader than this is the tablet for you seeing as you can download as many books as you like, I find this tablet eventually gets slow but it's good.

author: Diana T.
review: Easy to use, but don't like that Amazon wanted me to use all their own apps, so downloaded google play and firefox to it so I could use more of the apps I enjoy on my phone. Otherwise it works fine and does what I wanted it to do!

author: louann f.
review: I bought 2 for my daughters who were 9, 10 they loved them. Work pretty good for about 2 years. 1 still works and 1 doesn't anymore. For kids tablet (I've bought a few different ones) I would say I got my money's worth on both :)

author: Kristi T.
review: I just bought 3 of these. They are wonderful!. They are easy to set up, easy to use and kid friendly. I would buy another today if these went out. Great price, easy to find accessories for. I would recommend this in a heart beat.

author: Brandy W.
review: I am not A fan to what Amazon did with this tablet. Even if you change the settings, you're still going to have ads pop up. It doesn't hold very many games, which is the reason why we purchased this for the kids.

author: Mara L.
review: Great value for what you are getting! this is a product where you are really getting a bang for your buck. it is definitely not as nice as an iPad, but it is amazing for what it is. i would reccoment to anyone!

author: Monica K.
review: Easy to use for myself and family. I love that there is an option for a child's profile and has all the apps and shows that she enjoys& also the profile for myself that I can read and have my apps for myself!

author: Eric Z.
review: Nice portable tablet you can grasp with one hand. Great for reading or simple we browsing. Not a great 'app' machine as Amazon's app store is lacking. But for the price it's a nice reading and mobile device.

author: LB G.
review: Just got it so the only thing I can say is that so far it is very easy to get started. No issues setting it up and have begun to use it without any problems. Battery life is great, but it is brand new.

author: Spencer D.
review: Fantastic for everyday use! I needed a simple tablet that would serve as a mini TV for me via Netflix and Hulu. Cheap in price, high quality and easy to use. Also I drop it a lot and it never breaks!

author: Sylvia S.
review: Best little tablet you can buy for the price. It has anything on it I need. Compared to some of the cheaper ones out there it's a winner hands down. I've had no problems with it. Very affordable.

author: Heather O.
review: I am very happy with the quality of this tablet. I was worried about the clarity of the screen since it was not in HD, but it is very clear and easy to see. The sound quality is phenomenal.

author: Jackolyn S.
review: My family loves this tablet! It is very kid friendly when it comes to use and even better when it comes to safety and limiting use! I love that I can set timers and safety precautions.

author: Leah Y.
review: Great tablet at an affordable price, leaves very little to be desired. The screen resolution isn't top of the line but it isn't terrible either. Exceeded expectations, I use it daily.

author: Jessica O.
review: I have been Kindle fan since the beginning! I love my Kindle Fire and recommend it to everyone. I sold my Samsung tablet and went just with the Kindle for both my books and tablet.

author: Roseanne B.
review: This tablet has taken a beating with my 4 year old son, but still works perfect! I hate the parental controls, they are not easy to work with, and he ends up buying expensive apps.

author: CASSANDRA N.
review: I love this little guy. I bought it mostly to listen to books while I craft, clean, workout, work, etx and boy does it work great! It holds a charge fairly long. I was impressed.

author: tondrea m.
review: We love our kindles and this is our go to brand. we currently have 3 in the house. I use mine mostly for reading but I like to have the option for apps and Internet browsing.

author: Lisa V.
review: It's a good tablet for my kids. It comes with the Amazon underground so all the apps are free but the ads are annoying. It is very cheap for a tablet yet so far is reliable

author: Wendy E.
review: Purchased this for my sister who was diagnosed with breast cancer. She wanted something to make time pass as she was getting chemo. She loves it and it has helped so much!

author: Diane M.
review: This is a middle of the road tablet. Great for the price but limited memory. Sometimes a little slow if I have too many programs open and a little slow on loading movies.

author: Andy E.
review: I really like that I can use my Kindle like a computer. Everything is very simple and the night time color changing screen is helpful for late night reading.

author: Lindsay L.
review: Received this as a gift from my parents for Christmas. Absolutely fabulous! Took a while to get used to it, but that's just like any new electronic device.

author: Lindsay L.
review: Received this as a gift from my parents for Christmas. Absolutely fabulous! Took a while to get used to it, but that's just like any new electronic device.

author: Jamie V.
review: I bought this tablet because i needed an upgrade, the ads on it had me a little worried but they only play when the tablet is off, very good for the price

author: Karissa S.
review: This is my lifeline. It has all the features you want and need in a tablet, PLUS you can read books...and it's a fraction of the cost of regular tablets.

author: Claudia T.
review: Bought it for my 4 year old. Love how it has the kids setting so I never have to worry about him going into the Internet or browsing inappropriate things

author: Melissa A.
review: My son loves his Kindle fire! He is 10 and uses it all the time. He likes to download the free apps and try them out. We also got Minecraft for about $7.

author: Emily C.
review: Bought this for my mom for Christmas, who is anti technology, but she can work this easily! Clear screen and lots of memory. Easy access to the internet.

author: Abi K.
review: Love my tablet. I use it mostly to read and for recipes when cooking. It is very convenient as I was used to doing these things on my phone previously.

author: amarinder b.
review: My daughter loves it. It's light and plays all of her games and watches her shows on it. The price was very good when we bought it around the holidays

author: Amanda B.
review: I love the fire HD 7. It has parental controls so I can control what and how long my daughter is on it. Very easy to maneuver through tabs and apps.

author: Dionna S.
review: This a is a great tablet for the price. clear picture easy to handle. The only complaint I have is I feel that the battery life could be better.

author: Tacarra T.
review: I purchased 3 of these tablets on for myself and two for my kids. They love that it holds a lot of apps and games and the battery life is long.

author: Erin P.
review: I love this tablet. This is the second one Iv owned and it's really dependable and durable. I read all the time so this was perfect for me.

author: Samantha D.
review: Great for gaming and Facebook. Fast speed and Color. Very easy to use with familyband friends. Great with books. No problems experiences.

author: Lynne T.
review: Great tablet and very easy to use. There is a how to guide installed on the device. I can also get free games and books through Amazon.

author: Wanda W.
review: I love this tablet. I can do everything like : games. books, movies and tv, and surf the web. OIt is one of the best tablets out there.

author: Sierra T.
review: This is my mom's, we purchased it for 50 bucks at Best Buy right before Christmas. She loves it! It works great for she using it for .

author: lorraine p.
review: I own an amazon kindle and I absolute love it great features on it, did not experience any problems and if I do I contact amazon.

author: Breanne B.
review: Love this so much and got it on sale so that's even better and then my mother bought some for when the grandkids are at the house

author: Bianca L.
review: Pros: I like the apps and video quality.  Cons: low sound and kids can add apps (take away storage) even with paren't controls on.

author: Roseanne B.
review: I more or less use mine just for reading. I had a best buy gift card so I got this tablet for $5. I would have paid full price.

author: Kathy P.
review: I love the Fire tablet. It is super easy to use. I actually use it for my sons movies. It has the best screen quality for him.

author: Brian M.
review: What an amazing product. Love how small it is. And I am able to watch Netflix on it makes it amazing to own. Go buy one now!

author: Michelle B.
review: I love my tablet. I love to be able t read and not have a bulky book. Also I can watch movies and play games on the Kindle

author: Emily F.
review: I just bought this tablet as a Christmas present! I watched so many reviews and it looks awesome. Plus it's only 50 bucks

author: Jessie P.
review: It's ok I could never get the internet to work properly even hooked up to internet but I mostly use it for my daughter.

author: Kaitlin D.
review: Perfect storage space for someone who is a heavy user. I would suggest a case whoever, and the screen is easy to break.

author: Melissa J.
review: Works great! Great price cant go wrong with this tablet! And has tuns of app options and can download music and books

author: Teresa H.
review: Such an awesome tablet. bought on for me and one for my mom. They are fast and easy to use. Very nice screen also.

author: donna c.
review: I love it! It's convenient and easy to use.I can watch my Netflix, check emails, games, etc. you can't go wrong

author: Shanti B.
review: This product used to freeze everyday multiple times. Since they sent the update I haven't had to reset it once!

author: Amber N.
review: We love this tablet! Both of my children have one (age 7 and 4). Easy to use, and possibilities are endless.

author: Courtney W.
review: This is the best tablet on the market for the money. Very easy to use, clear picture, decent camera & sound.

author: Abigail L.
review: I love my Amazon tablet, it works fast, it's durable. I can read my books and still do other work from it.

author: Charmony H.
review: Very easy to use, easy to carry around, can connect to WiFi very quickly, and its very easy to read books

author: Debbie M.
review: Love the tablet. Great for reading. Versatile for Internet. Newest update is taking some getting used yo

author: Lorraine B.
review: I love my kindle. Whether I'm reading or watching movies/tv shows it's great! Battery life is great too!

author: amanda m.
review: For tablets its kindles . so much space. Its big the colors on it are amazing. Love how IG has a camera.

author: Kristy P.
review: Love this tablet. Very easy to use. My kid doesn't have any problem using it. Love the amazon network.

author: Monica H.
review: Easy to use. Love the display. My kids watch movies, play games, read books and so much more on this.

author: Marie W.
review: I bought 2 of these for my daughters. They love them. Now, they don't have to keep using my tablet!!!

author: Lindsay S.
review: Bought this and a case for outhe 3 year old and he loves it. We've had no issues with this tablet.

author: Emily S.
review: I really love this tablet. I can do everything on it. From reading, playing games, shopping, etc.

author: Cheryl L.
review: I like this tablet very much.It is easy to navigate and download apps.the price was rather cheap

author: Christian M.
review: I have mixed feelings about this tablet it like it and the way it functions but it has few apps

author: Chrissy P.
review: I love my Amazon Fire Tablet! I play games on it, read books, watch movies, take pictures, etc.

author: Karina W.
review: A great starter tablet! It's very easy to figure out. The whole Amazon store is easy to find.

author: Tana H.
review: Great picture great value for the price. Amazon always has great products and fast shipping!

author: Terrie D.
review: This tablet is awesome, great space snd speed. Very well priced. Love the Amazon app store.

author: Shaylla S.
review: Love my tablet. I got it for Christmas and not one crack. And I have dropped it many times.

author: Mckenna V.
review: My boyfriend bought me thus tablet for christmas and I love it! Such a bang for your buck.

author: Susan L.
review: Easy to use. User friendly.  Very fast and I can read books and surf internet quite easily

author: Caroline Joy H.
review: Works great. Had it for 3 years and its in awesome condition. Very fast and kid friendly

author: Jetta D.
review: I really liked using this tablet to read books on Kindle and watch TV shows on Amazon.

author: Emilia S.
review: I bought one for all 4 of my kids for Christmas. Very kid friendly. We love ours

author: saad s.
review: Hello I am here for everyone I love this product, I love all the products of this company if you allow me to review this product I would be grateful to you. With my love and appreciation my name is saad  and I have a channel on YouTube with a large number of views I do a lot of reviews of electronic devices . I can help you promote your products by reviewing them in my videos for the purpose of FYI is encouraging people to buy from the internet and on time The same help the company promote Best product for Beginners I love this Products ,and i want  review this Products in my channel my adresse is Street :saada 4 rue 44 nue 14 City : tanger Country: MOROCCO

author: Houssine F.
review: Hello, I love all the products of this company if you allow me to review this product I would be grateful to you . I can help you promote your products by reviewing them in my videos for the purpose of  encouraging people to buy from the internet and on  The same time help the company promote Good News. Best Regards.Houssine

author: rachel c.
review: This is a must have for all 4 of my kids on long car trips or vacation. They hook their headphones and play music and games without disturbing anyone or arguing over the radio. Even give my husband and me time and quietness to talk on the car ride. The downside is the memory not nearly enough when you put movies on them.

author: Laura S.
review: Love it! It's great to travel with. I can watch movies and work as well. I think the IPAD may be better than this one but I think for a reader and movies I think the Kindle beats the Apple on that. I don't use it a lot. But I'm happy when I do. I would recommend this product to anyone!

author: Ashley S.
review: All my kids have a  kindle fire. I love that i can restrict content on their sign in with Amazon freetime. I love that everything is age appropriate and that i can allow them to be on the internet or not. I love that the new fires have expandable memories.

author: Tiffany N.
review: I love my Kindle! My ex had a decent Samsung tablet that I enjoyed, but it felt like a giant phone that made no calls. I had a cheapie e-reader I received for Christmas forever and a day ago, and I loved having access to any number of books wherever I was, but I wanted to do more than just read. The obvious choice was the Kindle.It's rare that I let my kids touch my electronics (I'm sorry, I'm just not the mom that lets their kid slobber all over their iPhone... I'm entirely too poor to replace it if they break it) but I do like that I can take advantage of the parental settings super easily with the Kindle in case I do let either my 8 or 9 year old hop on. I don't know that I'll even entertain the thought of getting something other than a Kindle when it's time to replace. It's the perfect blend of tablet and e-reader, in my opinion.

author: Kinsey W.
review: I wanted a tablet that was affordable and straightforward. I wanted one to watch videos with, check my mail, play games and surf the web. Quite honestly, I was sick of my phone's small screen. My Fire tablet has been wonderful.  I've shopped online, watched videos, read books, listened to music with it. The battery life has been excellent. If you have an Amazon Prime account, you'll find that the tablet works seamlessly with it. The one drawback is the camera. It has a forward and selfie camera, however the picture quality leaves a lot to be desired. Save money and buy the tablet with less GB and purchase a separate memory card-you'll greatly increase your gigs for a fraction of the price.

author: Hiwa K.
review: Tablet device one of the most powerful smart phones in the world of a small device and very fast in a wonderful games and Internet and a very distinctive camera and powerful device is small and distinctive

author: Veronica P.
review: What don't I do with my kindle? That would be a hard question to answer. Its a wonderful tablet. What I enjoy more is reading my free books from the kindle unlimited subscription. Also I subscribed to Acaciatv to be able to try different workouts routine. So exercising is another activity that I enjoy in my kindle. Doing school research, browsing, shopping, paying my bills online, playing my favorite game of all times, mage and minions and others like mahjong. I go through battery charges a lot since it is on a great part of my day. The sound and image quality are AMAZING!!! I have never had any issues with my unit. Very fast and reliable tablet.

author: Crystal S.
review: I purchased 2 of these for my kiddos. At just $50 a piece they are well put together for the price point. They are sturdy enough to withstand the kids.I love the parental control. It makes sure your kids can't purchase anything or see anything inappropriate. You also can put a timer on it and the Amazon Fire will shut off so you can control how long your kids play. The lock code gives only you access to let your kids use the Fire. When the kids are not using them I also like to use them to read, play games and do quick searches. I give the Amazon Fire HD Tablet 5 stars and recommend them for the little ones in your life.

author: Yisel C.
review: muy buena tablet compramos dos para las niñas,me gusta porque puedes controlar lo que ven,puedes ponerle un pin para acceder a internet ,fácil de usar y tiene un ano de contenido gratis!

author: Colleen W.
review: I bought this because Amazon was having a sale where you could get it for around $100 I think. I bought it on a whim thinking I may like reading my books on there and being an artist, I could put my portfolio on there. Having a kindle fire has by far exceeded my expectations. I use this almost every day and I love it. I can watch netflix on it, read my books, browse Pinterest. I didn't want to buy an iPad because I wasn't sure if I would use it hence why I thought the kindle would be good. I'm so glad I did, it has everything I could want and I couldn't be happier.

author: Jen R.
review: My kids got these for Christmas and I really love that you can grant parental controls. This helps me limit their screen time without have a huge fight telling them to put it down

author: Rebecca U.
review: I used to have an HDX, but my kids broke it, so this is a replacement for it. Its a bit harder to use, in my opinion. Takes a while for me to find apps/things I stored to cloud. I do not like that it has no restart option-you have to turn it off, then back on again. But, it holds quite a bit of stuff, has fairly fast web browsing, and is adequate for what I do. If you are looking for a better sound/video quality I would go for the more expensive HDX. If you like to read and browse the internet, this one will do ya.

author: Megan M.
review: We own two of these. One I bought for my 10 year old and one for myself. Great tablet. Love the Amazon underground that has games with unlimited levels and lives. Great picture. I didn't want anything too big and this is perfect. I do wish it was a little louder especially when I'm streaming video but I pair it with my blue tooth speakers and it's fine. And they are currently on sale for under $50 on Amazon so can't complain. Easy to use. Good App Store. Highly recommend

author: Allison A.
review: Its very simple to use however I hate the ads that pop up on the lock screen. I also don't like that you cannot customize the background screens like on other tablets. It works really well for shopping on Amazon and the kids area is great. If you're looking for a great reader or if you only want to play games its a great tablet. Not all games are available on the Amazon store, and some things wont download at all because there isn't enough room on the tablet.

author: Kim P.
review: I love my Amazon kindle fire tablets and have purchased 4 of them now! Mine from 2013 still works great, and is my favorite! I also purchase 2 this past summer and they work great too. The newest model ($49) is my least favorite due to a narrower screen and no Swype. However overall these are great tablets with consistent performance! I have Amazon prime so purchase items from their store with free shipping, read their books, and watch videos all on my tablet! It has basically replaced my laptop for me! I've used ipads at work and prefer the use friendly and much more affordable kindle fires!

author: Kyla B.
review: I got this tablet for my 11 year old son to replace another tablet that took a tumble down a flight of stairs. We've had this tablet for a little while now and have ZERO complaints. The graphics are amazing for videos and games and the processor is speedy. He loves reading on his tablet now and can actually get a full color graphic novel as well. This is an awesome tablet for the price tag and I highly recommend!

author: Katherine A.
review: This is an upgrade from my original Kindle. I much prefer the backlit screen and larger size. While I still mostly use my Fire as a book, it is a much easier way to check my email or find something online than my smartphone is. I'm old-fashioned I guess but with the cover my Fire feels like I'm actually holding a book. The battery lasts a reasonable amount of time, unlike my phone, and if I'm running low on power it will charge as I read and get ahead of me. There a lot of features I haven't even started to use. I keep liking it better and better.

author: Jessie B.
review: I bought this tablet specifically for downloading books and reading. For that purpose it performs pretty well. However, as an overall tablet it could be better. The battery life is my main reasoning behind the rating. Even though I only use the tablet for reading, I have to charge the device daily or it will die. On your lock screen, ads are displayed when the tablet is not in use. This does not bother me, but may be a factor to others. Also, it runs pretty slowly and I have noticed some glitching when trying to switch between simple apps.

author: Christy W.
review: It's worked for everything I needed it to work for. I got it in cobalt green - not black. I really like that it does what I need it to do, quickly. I do wish it had a more clear/crisp volume - it sounds distorted at times, and I wish I had gone with the larger screen option, but I do like it enough not to ever buy a tablet again .. it's just more sturdy feeling, even. Overall, very satisfied. :)

author: Rachel G.
review: I bought this for my 10-year-old for Christmas and he loves it. The parental contols are really important to me, and Amazon has me covered. I have Amazon Prime and I'm really happy that I can share that with my son. We recently read a book together on our Kindles, and I think that was pretty exciting for him. He is kind of a slob, so I got the blue kid protector, just in case. So far my 3 year old has dropped it 100 times, but it still works just fine! I'm loving the Fire tablets!

author: Brooke S.
review: I love how lightweight and portable this tablet is. The battery runs very quickly so I constantly have to bring my charging cord with me if I will be using it for a few hours. I bought a Bluetooth keyboard for it and now use this tablet to take notes in class rather than bringing my laptop, and it has worked great for that. I do not like that you cannot change the background to something appealing to you (the background changes and appears as different ads).

author: mary k.
review: Tablet works pretty well for.internet browsing. had I to do it over I would have purchased a table with acess to the andriod store. holds up pretty well. husband has one in lifeproof case. son in no case, has bee. dropped, no cracks. mine got stepped on, crack in side and directly. across, but still works just fine, no issues with looking at screen. daughters got cracked in multiple places, also works fine and you can still see to do what you need to do.

author: Lauren B.
review: We bought our sons, each one In March 2015. Our sons are 8 and 5. We love the controls for being able to turn off wifi. They love the tablets. The only app that they've wanted to download but was not supported was the Crayola app for color alive. The mostly use them for Minecraft. But they are durable. We've taught them to take care of them, too. My youngest son loves the Little Critter stories that he an choose to have it read to him.

author: Rosalie G.
review: We recently purchased two of these for two of our children. Favorite part is that you can set up different time limits for different activities and have varying limits depending on the day of the week. So during the week they have short time limit on the device and then the limit is extended for Saturday and completely blocked off for Sunday (that is no electronics allowed day). This is nice that we don't have to keep going g to them to change the limit every day. You can also make the time limits vary between apps and books. We allowed longer time for books.

author: Alisha J.
review: My kids and I recently were given Kindle Fires for our Christmas gifts. I'm loving it! I use mine for reading because I can carry an entire library in my purse. The kids are more App happy. They love the educational games. There are a lot of free apps available through Amazon, which is great.

author: Heather S.
review: We LOVE our Kindles! We just bought our fifth one for our five year old daughter. We love the app options. We love how easy they are to use as readers. We love that she can watch Netflicks, play ABC Mouse, or have a book read to her. It's not a huge investment, for great quality!

author: mike b.
review: This product is very good works very well would recommend to any one also all the apps you get very good very affordable feels good screen looks clear and good

author: Raquel S.
review: My kid has dropped this, left it in the car in cold weather, and forgets to charge it for days and this thing still works perfectly. Used for games and reading books. The price is so great for what you get. Bought more memory for it and it can hold lots of music and games.

author: Keri D.
review: I primarily use this tablet for reading and it's been great. The size and weight are perfect. The screen is very clear. The few apps I do have downloaded work wonderfully. The browsing speed is great. The camera is not the best, but that was not why I purchased it.

author: Ashlie H.
review: I bought this tablet looking for something with a big enough and good enough quality screen for me to be able to read books on it and not bother my eyes and this was s hit! It was amazing you can change the brightness the text size the color of the text, you can customize it to your eyes. Most definitely a great product, would obviously recommend it to anyone!

author: Jenna B.
review: I bought this for my youngest son. I love the fact that you can put parental controls on it that allow you to control a lot of the extras. Example every time he wants to download something he has to have me put in a code this way I can check it out before agreeing to the purchase of whatever he wants to download. This product works every well for my 7 year old.

author: MaryGrace C.
review: I bought this as an upgrade from my 1st generation Kindle Fire. The picture is greatly improved from the first and the external volume control is greatly appreciated. I feel that the battery life isn't as good, but it makes up for it in visual quality.

author: Trish D.
review: I bought this for my son for Christmas. I thought it would be a great way to keep him reading, playing his games and having Amazon Video.It is really not that user friendly. My son has now figured it all out for the most part, but there isn't a whole I would be able to do on it without really sitting and playing with it and probably using YouTube.

author: Cara S.
review: I love this, it does everything I need with good speed quality. Movies and TV shows come in crystal clear. I love the size for its portability. I just got one for my twelve year old and she set it up with ease. Mom can finally have her own tech back

author: kim b.
review: Normally, I stick with Apple products, but I bought this as a Christmas gift for my grandson, not wanting to spend a lot in a tablet. I have to say this tablet packs a pretty big punch. The clarity is wonderful. Nice size screen, you don't have to strain to see. The are plenty of apps to download that are free and many good ones for kids. Books are not plentiful in the free price range as many are for other tablets. Over all this is a Big Bang for your buck <ed><U+00A0><U+00BD><ed><U+00B2><U+0099>it. Highly recommended.

author: Michelle H.
review: I got this as a gift for my daughter. She LOVES it. There have been no issues with it whatsoever. i wish I would have gotten the same one for myself. I spent a little more money on another brand for myself thinking that it would be better and well it was definitely NOT. Should have gotten another Fire HD for me too. next tablet will be a Fire

author: Bruce L and Michelle C.
review: I use this mainly to read books, it's been great, I do occasionally take it on trips as well and use it more as a small version of my laptop, lol! I do love it! The screen is bright, and very crisp picture, easy to skip around, easy to use.

author: Alexis O.
review: I like this tablet. For the price, it can't be beat. The good: Speakers are improved on earlier models. The screen is clear and processing is fast enough for my needs. The bad: Low battery warning is sporadic. It will tell me I have 10% battery and die two minutes later. I do encounter internet crashes more often than I would like too.

author: Ryan D.
review: I bought 2 of these for my kids for Christmas and they love them. They can play free games and watch movies. I added parental controls on them which is amazing because I do not have to worry about them buying anything.Recommend!!!!

author: Irene R.
review: Love love love my tablet! not expensive, works fast and does what I need it to do. I wish I got one with more storage but that's OK. I mainly let my kids use it for videos and games and I enjoy watching Hulu on it or reading.

author: Rose L.
review: I bought this so I could read and this ended blip being the best tablet for my child. It has no case and it's the most durable thing ever. It has no scratches no cracks and he is a boys boys. I also love that it can be customized so I have control over so much. The time limits, the media he is able to access, I love it!

author: Cassi M.
review: Bought this for my 3 year old son for road trips and airplane rides. The "FreeTime" app is perfect for toddlers as they can't get in to anything they aren't suppose to. But the apps hardly ever download if you want a new one for them to play. Doesn't notice but if I'm paying a monthly fee then I want all the apps to work.

author: Emily S.
review: I gifted this to a family member a couple years ago. To this day it works really great and they absolutely love it. I think it's really great for older, less tech-savvy people. It's easy to use and has great battery life!

author: Lizzy K.
review: Amazing tablet. I got the fire hd 7 when itbfirst came out and I still haven't updated. my version does not have a camera but I don't née one as I have so many devices with cameras. everything else is amazing. I can see it fairly well outside. not as good as the paper whites but it does the job. the Amazon app store is not a wide as others but has a lot of good options. I love amazon and kindle and will always support them!

author: Breyanna B.
review: This tablet is great for the price! I got it on a black Friday deal for like $99! The only problem is that there is a $15 charge to have the ads taken off the homescreen which I think diminishes the good price factor.

author: Katie R.
review: My entire family uses our Kindle and we all love it. We use it to read books, play games, etc. Amazon has great customer service, too, so I'm happy to support their company. Overall a great product, and a great upgrade to the Kindle we purchased a couple of years ago - faster, lighter, higher definition!

author: Jennifer M.
review: Perfect for my daughter! I was a little bit concerned about the lack of SD expansion, but that doesn't seem to be an issue so far. What I absolutely love is that we can set up profiles for everyone in the family. I'm considering getting another one for myself when I get ready to replace my Samsung tablet.

author: Jennifer H.
review: Love this tablet so far. Love the bright,clear screen resolution and the tablet in general. Sound is amazing. The only downfall is that it seems to lag a little bit. I have researching this issue and I'm going to check to see if there are a lot of running apps open on it which would explain the slowness.

author: Julie R.
review: I bought this tablet for my 7 year old son. How can you go wrong with a $35 tablet. That is the price that I paid during Black Friday on Amazon. I am a Amazon Prime Member. With that service I have lots of shows and movies that I can stream. My son has access to all of the same services that I do. That is what makes this so worth the money. He can stream without paying for data. The screen is small but so is he.

author: Jody S.
review: The selection of kindle books and the amount of free games through amazon underground make this one of the best purchases for the price I've seen. I bought it on Black Friday so that made the deal even better.

author: Lily C.
review: I own this tablet.! and it's really good :) i love the dolby audio system <3 what i don't like about it, is that it doesn't allow me to use skype, but everything else is just great, specially at that price.!

author: Meghana L.
review: Got this for christmas and absolutely love it. Not as high tech as my iPad so if you want continuous use I would go with the iPad but this tablet is great for occasional use for Netflix and online shopping!

author: member-8ceb21bff
review: It's ok, but can be slow if using for other things besides reading. Have problems staying connected to internet. I'm now in the process of looking at another type to upgrade to. Probably will not purchase another kindle for seven though the price is better than some other brands.

author: Katrina G.
review: I love to read on it. I love having a bigger screen than my phone provides me with. The battery life is decent, more or less what I expected from using it so much. And I love the way that you can store your content in the cloud and it won't take up any room on the tablet.

author: Megan L.
review: I love this product because it is very inexpensive, and it provides me with everything I could get with the more expensive tablets. I purchased it for the books, but I also love watching Netflix and other like services on the device. The only real issue I have with it is having to restart my Kindle each time I want to watch Netflix because otherwise it gives me an error.

author: Candi S.
review: Love it. This tablet is great and meets all my needs. I can even game on it! Highly recommend getting a memory card to go with it just in case. The camera isn't the best but works in a pinch.

author: Rebecca C.
review: So easy to use .so fast . So many perks like free apps and music . I also purchased the amazon case and that is equally good quality would highly recommend to anyone searching for a tablet!!!

author: Julie B.
review: I love fire tablet. I use it every day. It's easy to navigate and family friendly. I like that I can adjust. the brightness of the screen when I'm reading at night so I don't bother anyone else with the light. This is my second amazon tablet and I would buy one again.

author: Rebecca O.
review: Love it works awesome and is pure quality images of the best I have it for 3 years never once broken screen good doesn't break it doesn't do anything it's just really resistible to any girl

author: JOSE G.
review: Super practica para leer, ver videos, facil de usar, super portable y llena de momentos de entretenimiento, practica para viajar. Checas correo electronico, ves videos, puedes hacer compras en linea, en fin para todo lo que puedes hacer en tu celular y mas.

author: angela w.
review: Love my kindle fire! this is my third one! LOL so convenient for looking up recipes when I am cooking in the kitchen or for watching a television show when I am relaxing on the couch. Love!

author: Allyssa D.
review: I love everything about this tablet and how it's focused around reading. You can't beat the style of it with any other tablet or ereader on the market. I would know: I've owned a Nook and a kobo and this is by far the best. Though nothing can beat a real book.

author: Lorece S.
review: I love my fire tablet. Because I have amazon prime, I love how seamless it is for me to look at movies, read, and listen to music. The only thing I don't like is the internet browser and the lack of support from outside things that only connect to iPads.

author: Hallie B.
review: I had high expectations for my Amazon kindle fire HD 7 and truthfully it disappointed me. I'm sure it would probably be perfect for using it as just an e-reader but I got it for browsing the Internet. It is super slow and tends to shut down unexpectedly.
